meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of hypertext.
meanings.sent1: The website had a hypertextual layout, making it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the hypertextual nature of the online encyclopedia.
meanings.sent3: The hypertextual design of the book cover caught her eye.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in a hypertextual way, connecting ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The hypertextual presentation was both informative and engaging.

meanings.sent1: The hypertextual links in the document allowed for easy access to related information.
meanings.sent2: The students were assigned a hypertextual project for their research assignment.
meanings.sent3: She found herself lost in a hypertextual maze of interconnected web pages.
meanings.sent4: The hypertextual nature of the software enabled quick navigation between different sections.
meanings.sent5: His writing style was hypertextual, with numerous embedded links for further reading.
